```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
x <- read_csv("data/i_names.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
summary(x)
```

```{r}
x |>
  summarize(num_per_mil = sum(n),
              .by = c(year, sex)) |>
  filter (year >= 1900) |>
ggplot(aes(x=year, y = num_per_mil, group= sex, fill = sex)) +
  geom_area()
  
```
